title: Kissing You
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Pride can stand a thousand trials
The strong will never fall
But watching stars without you
My soul cries
[Chorus]
Heaving heart is full of pain
Oh, oh, the aching
'Cause I'm kissing you, oh
I am kissing you, oh
[Verse 2]
Touch me deep, pure and true
Gift to me forever
[Chorus]
'Cause I'm kissing you, oh
I'm kissing you
[Bridge]
Hmm, oh, hmm
Yeah, oh, oh
Hmm
Hmm

[Chorus]
Where are you now?
Where are you now?
'Cause I'm kissing you, oh
I'm kissing you, oh
